chat_history.message:
Hello,

My iPhone 13 has the above problem:

Hello, my phone should have arrived by now. But it hasn't even been shipped yet. What's going on? As I'm urgently in need of the new one since my current phone is broken.

Best regards, Maria

Thank you for your help,

Dear ecomobile

when will the parcel be sent


Regards,
Hamza from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

We would like to apologize. The parcel appears to be stolen. We are conducting an internal investigation. In the meantime we have reimbursed the customer completely for this order. We are sorry for the inconvenience caused.

Thanks,
AS
